name: Wheel are Fragile!
description:
Two wheels, only connected by an easily breakable stick, must work together to navigate the treacherous path of the Table

===========================================================

CONTROLS: (keyboard/controller)

W/Left joystick Up - Roll left wheel forwards

S /Left joystick Down - Roll left wheel backward

Up Arrow/Right joystick Up - Roll right wheel forwards

Down Arrow/Roll right wheel backward

R/Start - Restart level

Esc - Quit

Song Used: A Quiet Thought - Wayne Jones (Copyright Free)

===========================================================

For reasons beyond our comprehension, no UI text will appear on the last level. When you clear a level and nothing happens, you are done. You're not missing out on anything, that is the end.
